verses.verse: <S%H2803>Think<s%> you this to be <S%H4941>right<s%>, that you <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is more than <S%H410>God<s%>'s?
For you <S%H559>said<s%>, What <S%H5532>advantage<s%> will it be unto <S%H3276>you<s%>? and, What profit shall I <S%H2403>have<s%>, if I be cleansed from my sin?
I will <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H7453>you<s%>, and your companions with you.
<S%H5027>Look<s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>; and <S%H7789>behold<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> which are higher than <S%H1361>you<s%>.
If you <S%H2398>sin<s%>, what <S%H6466>do<s%> you against <S%H6588>him<s%>? or if your transgressions be <S%H7231>multiplied<s%>, what do you unto <S%H6213>him<s%>?
If you be <S%H6663>righteous<s%>, what <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H3947>him<s%>? or what receives he of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>?
Your <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> may hurt a <S%H376>man<s%> as you <S%H6666>are<s%>; and your righteousness may profit the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.

By reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> they make the oppressed to <S%H2199>cry<s%>: they cry <S%H7768>out<s%> by reason of the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7227>mighty<s%>.
But none <S%H559>says<s%>, Where is <S%H433>God<s%> my <S%H6213>maker<s%>, who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>;
Who <S%H502>teaches<s%> us more than the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and makes us <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>?
There they <S%H6817>cry<s%>, but none gives <S%H6030>answer<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of evil <S%H7451>men<s%>.
Surely <S%H410>God<s%> will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, neither will the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> regard <S%H7789>it<s%>.
<S%H637>Although<s%> you <S%H559>say<s%> you shall not <S%H7789>see<s%> <S%H1779>him<s%>, yet judgment is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2342>him<s%>; therefore trust you in him.
But <S%H6485>now<s%>, because it is not so, he has visited in his <S%H639>anger<s%>; yet he <S%H3045>knows<s%> it not in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6580>extremity<s%>:
